title: Scarlett Moffatt continues to flaunt her dramatic weight loss - despite fans' concern
text:
She has shed an impressive amount of weight in recent months - more than two stone, to be precise. 
And, clearly, Scarlett Moffatt is Proud of her hard work, as she proved when she was spotted strutting her stuff out the BBC;s Broadcasting House in central London on Saturday. 
The reality TV star, who's famous for her one-liners on Gogglebox, cut a lithe figure as she stepped out of the media hub following another profile-boosting appearance. Scarlett Moffatt snapped outside the BBC Studios on Saturday (Photo: Rex Features) 
Squeezing herself into a pair of sexy leather trousers, the brunette beauty, 26, looked fantastic as she cliutched a take-away coffee in one hand and a designer handbag in the other. 
Beaming a broad smile as she greeted onlookers, the jungle queen - who won I'm A Celeb in December - appeared to be on fine form. 
This is despite the fact fans have been pleading with her not to lose any more blubber after posting a skinny snap of herself on Instagram, Wednesday. 
The Geordie lass was inundated with messages from concerned fans who feel she's at risk of surpassing her ideal body mass. The TV star looked fab in a pair of skinny-fit leather trousers (Photo: Rex Features) This time last year Scarlett was much curvier as she boozed up a storm in Soho (Photo: FameFlynet) 
One concerned fan wrote: "Please don't lose any more weight," while another added: "I don't want to hurt you look amazing but please don't lose any more weight". 
The comments came just days after Scarlett revealed on This Morning that was once considered obese by doctors. 
After weighing nearly 12 stone, she went to her GP with back pain and low energy levels. He later blamed the excess weight she was carrying. Scarlett proves that less is more - although some fans disagree (Photo: Instagram) 
"It was hard for me, going home and explaining to my mum and dad why I went to the doctors and what was wrong with me," she said. 
"They also tested my for diabetes type 2 because they said I could be pre-diabetic, and I was like 'Oh my gosh, I’m 25, I don’t understand how I’ve got to this’..." 
But it wasn't an easy journey. In a sneak preview from the DVD, the star can be seen at the start of her journey getting weighed. 
When she finds out she weighs 11 stone 5lbs, she bursts into tears. "I would just say to anyone starting out [losing weight and getting healthy], just focus on the positives," Scarlett added. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
